Text:
Demonoid cross post:

demonoid [.] me
[slash] files
[slash] details
[slash] 2683172

There's a -200ms lip sync error at the beginning. The error is in the MPEG2 source as well.

ITV are using the h264 HD stream to create the Mpeg2 SD stream and audio sync is always a problem with HD.

In VLC hitting the 'J' and 'K' keys shifts the audio by 50ms - try hitting 'J' 4 times to create a -200ms audio offset.

The audio comes back into sync later on. I'll have to check for this in future and encode using a different method.
